title: I Took It Personally
description: That's right! Take it personally because it is personal! The enemy of your soul would have you roll over and play dead while he destroys your sons, daughters, families, and ministries. But Isaiah 59:19(b) says, "When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord will lift up a standard against him and put him to flight for He will come like a rushing stream which the breath of the Lord drives." (Amplified Bible). God's waves are bigger than your enemies' waves. Amen? Offensively and defensively, get your strategic and tactical weaponry in place. Read this book, and experience God's supernatural redeeming love for a twenty-first-century prodigal son. Read this book, and experience the victorious account of how the Anchor Academy for Boys saved a life to be used by God. Read this book, and win the war! Josmamie Thomas, affectionate pen name, is an assistant to her beloved husband who is the Pastor of a Christ-centered, Holy Spirit-filled, Bible-believing and-teaching church located in Southeastern, Pennsylvania. Josmamie is an engineer for the U.S. government in the industrial capabilities sector for Chemical and Biological Defense. Chemical and biological warfare are the poor man's choice of weapons of mass destruction. Married for thirty years to her high school sweetheart, with two adult independent sons, she resides in Southeastern Pennsylvania.
author: Josmamie Thomas
